name: Violetgrass
desc: A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

customize.name: Violetgrass Seed
customize.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Violetgrass.

customize.name: Verr Goldet
customize.desc: The owner of Wangshu Inn. She claims to be from Mondstadt and moved to Liyue with her husband Huai'an to manage the inn.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Herbalist Gui
customize.desc: A pharmacist who works under Baizhu. He creates and sells medicines at Bubu Pharmacy.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Babak
customize.desc: A researcher and the manager of the largest imported goods shop in Port Ormos. It is under the direct management of the Akademiya.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Baizhu
customize.desc: The owner of Bubu Pharmacy, who is rarely seen without the white snake named Changsheng. His medicinal knowledge is encyclopedic, and his personal intrigues subtle.

customize.name: Qiqi
customize.desc: An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.

customize.name: Xinyan
customize.desc: Liyue's sole rock 'n' roll musician. She rebels against ossified prejudices using her music and passionate singing.

customize.name: Stone Harbor Delicacies
customize.desc: Wok-fried vegetarian food. A stir-fried selection of three ingredients hailing from Liyue. Though the methodology is simple, it brings out the intense, innate flavors of the ingredients, and does not fade in brilliance when compared to some high-class delicacy.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Violetgrass
customize.desc: A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

customize.name: Matsutake
customize.desc: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

customize.name: Black-Back Perch Stew
customize.desc: A poached fish dish. The fresh and tasty fish fillets are tender and juicy. The secret to this recipe is adding powdered Violetgrass into the heated oil to give the dish that aromatic scent. It's spicy, but not too spicy.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili
customize.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

customize.name: Salt
customize.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

customize.name: Violetgrass
customize.desc: A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

customize.name: Wanmin Restaurant's Boiled Fish
customize.desc: Xiangling's specialty. This is the signature dish of the Wanmin Restaurant, combining Xiangling's heartfelt passion for cuisine. Anyone who tastes it will gain a pure appreciation for gourmet food amid the hearty and addictive blend of flavors.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili
customize.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

customize.name: Violetgrass
customize.desc: A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

customize.name: Jade Fruit Soup
customize.desc: A traditional Liyue dessert. The water is brought to boil, various ingredients are added in, and then it is simmered for some time before rock sugar is added. The liquid mixture is then simmered until clear and thick. The lengthy simmering creates a soup with a gentle mouthfeel, causing the ingredients to melt with just a light sip. Suitable for all ages.

customize.name: Sunsettia
customize.desc: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Qingxin
customize.desc: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.

customize.name: Violetgrass
customize.desc: A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

customize.name: Heat-Quelling Soup
customize.desc: Baizhu's specialty. "This isn't actually medicine, merely something that can alleviate dryness." As Baizhu's concerned voice echoes in your ears, a bowl of lustrous fruit soup greets your gaze. "This dish didn't use to have sugar, but he was worried that you wouldn't be used to the bitter taste, so he added some to it," added Changsheng.

customize.name: Bountiful Year
customize.desc: Luxurious and exquisite raw fish. The fish is sliced thinly and arranged in the shape of a flower before a ring of side dishes is set all around it. Normally, the side dishes will be mixed with the raw fish according to one's taste before consumption — this act is said to ensure that things will be smooth sailing in the coming days.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

customize.name: Carrot
customize.desc: A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.
